sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-descriptions title="账户信息">
    <a-descriptions-item label="姓  名">{{name}}</a-descriptions-item>
    <a-descriptions-item label="工  号">{{userId}}</a-descriptions-item>
  </a-descriptions>


  <a-table :columns="columns" :data-source="dataGroups" class="components-table-demo-nested" :rowKey="item => item.userId" >
  </a-table>

</template>

 <script>
import { defineComponent,ref,reactive } from 'vue';
import{getworkerMessage} from '../../api/api.js'




  export default defineComponent({
    setup  () {
      let userId = ref()
      let name = ref()
      let getid = localStorage.getItem("Userid");
      getworkerMessage(getid).then(
       response =>{
         if (response['code'] == 1){
           name.value = response['data'].name
           userId.value = response['data'].userId
         }
       })

    return {
       name,
       userId
    }}
    })
    </script>
